snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Friday's selection includes a surge in the number of homes for sale for more than $1 million near Facebook's headquarters and the company that...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Friday's selection includes a surge in the number of homes for sale for more than $1 million near Facebook's headquarters and the company that made the images shown on Buckingham Palace during Queen Elizabeth's jubilee concert.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Military Robots and Royal Animation
